name: Dokkaebi
shortLoreBlurb: Dokkaebi is a spirit from Korea associated with goblin, trickery, reward/punish. Lessons arise from pranks that backfire or expose human folly.
overlapsLinks: Anansi (Akan), Athena (Greek), Coyote (Native American), Durga (Hindu), Hermes (Greek), Karttikeya (Hindu), Loki (Norse), Sekhmet (Egyptian)
description: Dokkaebi is a spirit from Korea associated with goblin, trickery, reward/punish. Lessons arise from pranks that backfire or expose human folly.
